<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	
Bahrain Reliability Award 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/afe5be0b24e9cc7655f41a3af16d6c1d1127214384.jpg> 	

Chalhoub & Buhindi in Bahrain secured 1st place out of 40 organisations in the Product & Services Reliability category at the prestigious Jadara Award 2025, hosted during the Bab Al-Bahrain Forum under the patronage of His Royal Highness Prince Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa and presented by the Bahrain Chamber of Commerce and Tamkeen.
This achievement reflects our dedication to excellence to our customers and people through reliable products and services.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Promotion & Rewards Roadshow

Your feedback from the Voice of the People survey highlighted the need for more clarity around promotions and salary changes. Join us for an informative session on 14 May, from 3 to 4 PM (Dubai time) to learn more about our promotion policy, reward philosophy, salary structures, increase process, and review cycle.

Calendar invites will be shared shortly - stay tuned!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/41f7ce346e0a2182ddba280eabfc9eeb139317415.jpg>
